items.name: ADIDAS RESPONSE HOVERTURF
items.description: Adidas is back with another release for the green-thumbed sneakerheads, reworking the Response Hoverturf with colourways inspired by early ‘00s trail runners, END Clothing.

items.name: BALENCIAGA TRACK 2
items.description: One of the finest sneakers available on market

items.name: ADIDAS X CONCEPTS A-ZX ZX9000
items.description: For that moment when u feel like wearing casual clothes but u want that special vibe

items.name: AMIRI HOODY
items.description: Inspired by the glowing Mediterranean sun, this AMIRI hoody is wrapped in pastel hues to create a watercolour design that will transport you to the coast.

items.name: BURBERRY WOVEN TECHNICAL HOODY
items.description: This piece is a must have for any sweaters lovers

items.name: MONCLER GENIUS 1952
items.description: Centered with an ‘M’ shaped building block, this Moncler sweatshirt comes in a washed salmon pink hue.

items.name: RAF SIMONS SLIM FIT WASHED JEAN
items.description: These Raf Simons jeans — with their washed black hue and chain zip detailing — perfectly capture the Belgian designer’s punk rock aesthetic , END Clothing.

items.name: REPRESENT DESTROYER JEAN
items.description: Distressed denim is a Represent signature; it’s used by the label to convey a rebellious, street-focused approach to styling. These jeans are just that.

items.name: POLO RALPH LAUREN RECYCLED LIGHTWEIGHT DOWN JACKET
items.description: Prep for cooler weather with the help of Polo Ralph Lauren. Lined with an innovative fill fibre that mimics the look, feel and performance of down, this lightweight jacket offers unrivalled warmth.

items.name: NEIL BARRETT LOGO CONTRAST SLEEVE COACH JACKET
items.description: In a cool palette of black and white, this coach jacket is a premium piece of preppy outerwear from Neil Barrett’s AW20 collection. Detailed with striped ribbed cuffs and an open camp collar, it’s completed with a monogram logo patch placed proudly at the chest.

items.name: NIKE HERITAGE INSULATED VEST
items.description: Transition through the seasons with ease in this Nike Heritage vest. Designed to keep you warm and dry in unpredictable weather, it combines a water repellent outer shell with an insulating Sherpa fleece interior to lock in the warmth.

jackets.name: Coats & Jackets
jackets.description: For boys that know what they want

items.name: GUCCI SPIKE MASK PRINT LOGO OVERSIZED TEE
items.description: Ahead of Gucci’s AW19 show, attendees received face casts of Ancient Greek god Hermaphroditus, giving them a hint of what to expect – the collection was centred around the theme of being both visible and invisible, or, ‘the mask’.

items.name: BALENCIAGA PARIS TOURIST LOGO TEE
items.description: Balenciaga puts a luxury spin on souvenir styles this season, crafting this emerald green tee in Italy from soft cotton jersey. It celebrates all things Paris, from the vibrant energy to the Eiffel Tower and its reputation as the city of love.

items.name: VETEMENTS DOUBLE MARIA TEE
items.description: Double the style, this oversized Maria tee from VETEMENTS shows off a layered build that’s made from pure cotton jersey. Stamped with leafy branding, its bold look is completed with a classic ribbed collar.

tshirts.name: T-Shirts
tshirts.description: You can't say u have style without one of our t-shirts

items.name: Y-3 CLASSIC BEANIE
items.description: Yohji Yamamoto’s Y-3 sticks to what it knows best with this beanie: black. The stealthy hue covers the entirety of the pure wool construction, save for the bright white brand patch that sits front and centre.

items.name: GUCCI LIBERTY PRINT BUCKET HAT
items.description: Italy’s love affair with London’s iconic department store goes back a century – the Art Nouveau movement was referred to as ‘Stile Liberty’.

accesories.name: Hats
accesories.description: Something for the hipster inside you
